attributes.action: Make it law to Stop cats from roaming in built up and busy areas across the UK
attributes.additional_details: Keeping cats restricted to within their homes and gardens in busy and built up areas across the UK will help protect cats from road traffic aswell as people it will also help prevent over breeding, It will prevent cats from preying on birds and fouling in other people's gardens no matter what speed signs are put in this is a reoccurring problem which causes huge tragedy which is highly disregarded and needs to change, at the very least AWARENESS  needs to be raised
attributes.background: Stop cats from roaming in built up and busy areas across the uk aswell as adding cats to the 1988 road traffic act, make it law to keep cats inside unless suitable enclosed spaces are provided eg a catio
